fields.description: See discussion in that JIRA. It needs to be committed in two parts, with bulk logging change committed separately due to perf issues.
fields.summary: revert the if removal from HIVE-12237

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] can you please revert? Otherwise I will do it after lunchtime (PST :))
Working on restoring if check guards. Will upload patch shortly.
Semi automatic patch. I restored all files with check guards then redid the unrelated changes.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12769643/HIVE-12292.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error
